Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-0690 affecting package ansible for versions less than 2.14.12-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-0690 affecting package ansible for versions less than 2.14.12-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package ansible is earlier than 2.14.12-2, affected by CVE-2024-0690
